name: hospital-api
description: Hospital Management API with Fastify and PostgreSQL

scripts.db:reset: docker exec hospital-db psql -U postgres -c "SELECT pg_terminate_backend(pid) FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE datname = 'hospital_db' AND pid <> pg_backend_pid();" && docker exec hospital-db psql -U postgres -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS hospital_db;' && docker exec hospital-db psql -U postgres -c 'CREATE DATABASE hospital_db;' && npm run db:migrate
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
